EmailTemplate.name: Aerowave Internal Cancel Rqst
EmailTemplate.subject: Failure to Renew Aerowave - Serv Cancellation {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Jeff or Eric,
We have made 3 attempts to contact the Customer to request renewal of the Aerowave plan for aircraft XXXXX
They have received a final notice and have not responded so we are requesting your approval to cancel service.
Please respond by XX-XX-XX. If we don't hear back from you we will proceed with cancellation.
Thank you,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
